column1: poly_deg: degree of appended polynomial: integer in range [2
phs_deg: exponent of polyharmonic spline: integer with options: 3
cloud_size_multiplier: float cloud_size=cloud_size_multiplier*(No. of appended polynomials)
nt: No. of timesteps: positive integer

column2: lambda: sum of largest magnitude convection and diffusion eigen values

column1: steady_tolerance: solved to steady state till [avg(abs(phi_new - phi_old))/dt < steady_tolerance] for all variables
solver_tolerance: used in iterative solvers for absolute and relative residuals (recommended: less than steady_tolerance)
n_iter: no. of iterations of the solver
